subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Even though his parents, Homer and Janet, brother Bryce, and extended family sat in the Baylor rooting section, Coach Scott Drew did not sneak so much as a glance at them during Friday’s game.
snippet: Even though his parents, Homer and Janet, brother Bryce, and extended family sat in the Baylor rooting section, Coach Scott Drew did not sneak so much as a glance at them during Friday’s game.
